title: The World's Greatest Photography Course
creator_credit: VCA Programs, Howard J. Blumenthal and Hal Rein
brief_description: Photographer Lief Ericksenn hosts this instructional course that guides the viewer through various photographic techniques aimed at improving your pictures. He introduces ways of developing your visual skills, suggests how to use your camera creatively, outlining camera functions and advising on the selection of film and appropriate lenses to achieve interesting and professional results.
